title: How to get text nodes except empty via JavaScript
body:
```javascript /** * Get Text Nodes */ function getTextNodes() { let walk = document.createTreeWalker(document.body, NodeFilter.SHOW_TEXT, null, false); let node = walk.firstChild(); let nodesList = [];

  // Node traverse
  while (node) {

    // Add not empty text node
    if (node.nodeValue.replace(/\u00a0/g, 'x').trim().length != 0) {
      nodesList.push(node);
    }

    node = walk.nextNode();
  }

  return nodesList;
}

let nod = getTextNodes();
